name: Return of Curiosity
description:
Return of Curiosity is a PC game originally created for Global Game Jam 2019 by a group of students at Southern Arkansas University. 

Return of Curiosity shows a future after the loss of the Opportunity Rover where NASA did everything in its power to ensure the safety and survival of its other rover, Curiosity, even granting her sentience. Enter the tracks of the long forgotten Curiosity awoken to find Mars colonized and full of Humans. 

Explore Mars, and find a way home!
